snippet: The strikes are the first time the United States has directly attacked Yemen’s Houthi rebels, who are fighting the Yemeni government....
abstract: Pentagon spokesman says United States warship off coast of Yemen fired cruise missiles at radar installations used by Houthi insurgents to target another American warship; strike was approved by Pres Obama, and marks first time US has become involved militarily in Yemen's civil war.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and MARK MAZZETTI

lead_paragraph: The strikes are the first time the United States has directly attacked Yemen’s Houthi rebels, who are fighting the Yemeni government.

headline.main: U.S. Ship Off Yemen Fires Missiles at Houthi Rebel Sites
headline.print_headline: American Warship Fires Missiles at 3 Yemeni Rebel Installations

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
